1582610400.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
1582610400.descr: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe. Live from London, tracking the breaking and top business news stories in the lead-up to the opening of European markets.

1582614000.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
1582614000.descr: Bloomberg Markets: European Open. Live from London, is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

1582621200.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
1582621200.descr: Bloomberg Surveillance. Live from London and New York, bringing insight on global markets and the top business stories of the day.

1582632000.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Americas
1582632000.descr: Bloomberg Daybreak: Americas. Live from New York, bringing viewers the latest in business and finance, providing unique global insights into where industry and markets are headed.

1582639200.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Open
1582639200.descr: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

1582642800.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
1582642800.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Americas. Live from New York, is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

1582646400.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
1582646400.descr: Bloomberg Markets: European Close. Live from New York and London, analyzing the major market moving stories across the day in Europe, hear from the biggest newsmakers and showcase the unrivaled expertise of Bloomberg News.

1582650000.title: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power
1582650000.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power focuses on the politics and policies being shaped by the agenda of President Trump's administration.

1582653600.title: Bloomberg Money Undercover
1582653600.descr: Bloomberg Money Undercover looks at the world of private debt, equity and real estate. Lisa Abramowicz meets investors who are pouring money into the private market at an unprecedented level.

1582655400.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
1582655400.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Americas. Live from New York, is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

1582657200.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
1582657200.descr: This fast-paced programme is the quintessential market close show leading up to the final minutes and seconds before the closing bell on Wall Street with the latest news, data and expert analysis.

1582664400.title: What'd You Miss?
1582664400.descr: Bloomberg TV's flagship markets program, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. It's a counterintuitive, highly intelligent look at the markets that misses absolutely nothing.

1582668000.title: Bloomberg Markets
1582668000.descr: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

1582671600.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia
1582671600.descr: Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia. Live from New York and Hong Kong, bringing you the essential stories from the close of the U.S. markets to the open of trading across Asia.

1582678800.title: Bloomberg Markets: China Open
1582678800.descr: The definitive guide to the markets in Hong Kong and on the mainland. Rishaad Salamat, David Ingles, Tom Mackenzie and Yvonne Man bring you the latest analysis to get you ready for the trading day.

1582682400.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
1582682400.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Asia. Live from Hong Kong, bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

1582689600.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
1582689600.descr: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East live from Dubai, connects Asian markets to the European opens. The show focuses on global macro issues with a Middle Eastern context.
